casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, as Successor in Interest to Bank of America National Association, the Successor by Merger to Lasalle Bank National Association, in its Capacity as Trustee for Thornburg Mortgage Securities Trust 2006-3, by Caliber Home Loans, Inc., f/k/a Vericrest Financial, Inc., as its Attorney in Fact, Appellant,
v.
CRESCENT OAKS FORECLOSURES, LLC; Paul Jallo; Nina Jallo a/k/a Ninawa Maajoin Jallo; Capital City Bank; Crescent Oaks Community Assocation, Inc., Appellees. Case No. 2D16-4830 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed April 4, 2018.

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
